headline: Why U.S. Steel Stock Is Down Even Though Everyone Wants a Piece of It
summary: Activist investor Ancora laid out plans to revitalize U.S. Steel, but the company’s future remains uncertain.

headline: Nucor Executive Vice President Gregory J. Murphy to Retire; Benjamin M. Pickett and Douglas R. Wilner to be Promoted
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C., Feb. 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Nucor Corporation announced today that Gregory J. Murphy, Executive Vice President of Business Services and General Counsel, plans to retire effective...
